remarks.format: ## Remarks 請記住物件會儲存狀態呼叫之間。Remember that the object saves state between calls to . 當應用程式是使用資料的資料流時，它應該設定`flush`參數來`true`藉此確定的狀態資訊會排清。When the application is done with a stream of data, it should set the `flush` parameter to `true` to make sure that the state information is flushed. 使用此設定時，編碼器會忽略無效的位元組資料區塊的結尾，並清除內部緩衝區。With this setting, the encoder ignores invalid bytes at the end of the data block and clears the internal buffer. 根據目前的後援設定來轉換屬於的邏輯單元，例如之高 surrogate 的 surrogate 字組，任何其餘處理過的資料。Any remaining processed data that is part of a logical unit, such as the high surrogate of a surrogate pair, is converted according to the current fallback settings. `Convert`方法設計用來在迴圈中用來編碼任意數量的輸入，例如從檔案或資料流讀取的資料。The `Convert` method is designed to be used in a loop to encode an arbitrary amount of input, such as data read from a file or stream. 它會將編碼作業的輸出儲存在固定大小緩衝區。It stores the output of the encoding operation in a fixed-size buffer. 如果輸出緩衝區不夠大，所以，便會擲回例外狀況，但會填滿盡可能最多空間，並傳回的字元，讀取和寫入的位元組數。 will throw an exception if the output buffer isn't large enough, but will fill as much space as possible and return the chars read and bytes written. 另請參閱主題的更多的註解。Also see the topic for more comments. `completed`輸出參數會指出是否在輸入緩衝區中的所有資料的轉換，並儲存在輸出緩衝區。The `completed` output parameter indicates whether all the data in the input buffer was converted and stored in the output buffer. 此參數設為`false`所指定的字元數`charCount`無法轉換參數，但不超過所指定的位元組數目`byteCount`參數。This parameter is set to `false` if the number of characters specified by the `charCount` parameter cannot be converted without exceeding the number of bytes specified by the `byteCount` parameter. 在此情況下，應用程式應該使用輸出緩衝區的內容，或提供新的輸出緩衝區，遞增值`chars`參數所指定的字元數`charsUsed`參數，然後呼叫`Convert`方法一次若要處理其餘的輸入。In that situation, the application should use the contents of the output buffer or provide a new output buffer, increment the `chars` parameter by the number of characters specified by the `charsUsed` parameter, then call the `Convert` method again to process the remaining input. `completed`參數也可以設定為`false`，即使`charsUsed`和`charCount`參數是否相等。The `completed` parameter can also be set to `false`, even though the `charsUsed` and `charCount` parameters are equal.
